attributes.action: remove Alistair Darling from his post following the Child Benefit Disk fiasco.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the loss of two discs containing personal details of 25 million people by HMRC and the Chancellor's witholding of the facts from the general public it most concerns for ten days, Mr Darling's position is surely now intenable. The Prime Minister needs to act now to prevent further lax incompetence within Government departments and agencies and to increase the transparency in Government so that cover-ups do not occur.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
